name: Unlimited Ammo - 2D Shooter Game
description:
---- Game Introduction ----

This is a simple single and multiplayer game with simple controls.This game is made using python pygame module. 

Developer(s) : Rajat Nishad

language : Python

Released On : 16-August-2022

----     Game Controls          ----

To Control Player 1 Use : A and D to move it backward and forward.

  W to make it jump

  Space to Shoot

To Control Player 2 Use : Left and Right Arrow Key to move it backward and forward

  Up Arrow Key to make it jump

  Mouse Buttons to shoot

*************************************

Thanks For Downloading my game!
